name: 陳秀慧
objective:
教授化學儀器分析原理、應用、儀器裝置及限制，準確度等。內容有紅、可見、紫外、X 光 、核磁共振光譜、表面分析之電子質譜方法、熱分析以及不同的分析方法如 、液體層析等。
This text will introduce the fundamental principles and Applications of modern Analytical instruments.Measuring devices, limitations of measurements in terms of sensitivity and accuracy will also be taught. The contents are infrared, visible, ultraviolet, X-ray and nuclear magnetic spectroscopes, Analysis of sur-faces with electron beams and mass spectrometry, thermal methods and chromatography and related separation methods.
